protocol.text: Treatment with 50 mM NaCl for 3 h in 4-week old plants grown on soil.
Total RNA was extracted with TriZol reagent (Invitrogen)
Targets were prepared with MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Single Round aRNA Amplification Kit (Ambion).
Targets were prepared with MessageAmp II-Biotin Enhanced Single Round aRNA Amplification Kit (Ambion) and hybridized to ATH1 gene chips (Affymetrix).
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol
